definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: They take their luck with currents, and create tiny eddies to guide food toward their tendrils.
sentences.chinese: 它们利用电流，制造出小漩涡，让食物流向卷须。

sentences.english: Many have tendrils in leaf axils.
The stems have coiling tendrils and are green, slender, and hairless.
sentences.chinese: 茎有卷须和卷取是绿色的，纤细，无毛。

sentences.english: Inflorescence a corymbose cyme , leaf-opposed or pseudo terminal, often at tips of tendrils.
sentences.chinese: 花序伞房状聚伞花序，对生或，通常在顶部的卷须。

sentences.english: The tendrils of climbing plants are thigmotropic.
sentences.chinese: 攀援植物的卷须就有向触性。

sentences.english: Its tendrils curl around the stem of the host plant.
sentences.chinese: 它的卷须缠绕在寄主植物的茎上。

sentences.english: The morning glory climbs the trunk with its tendril .
sentences.chinese: 牵牛花用卷须攀着树干。

sentences.english: She holds up her hands, letting the TENDRILS caress her.
sentences.chinese: 她抬起她的双手，让卷须轻拂着她。

definition: branches and tendrils/fig. overcomplicated or digressive
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
